name: Zombie Zap
description:
This was a project which I made for my university course using the Construct 3 game engine. It was a task assigned to my Web Games class to see if we could make a simple game using this new engine within 3 days. We were given a brief of making a top down zombie shooter.

Install Instructions:

Download and Unzip the files. Choose between the files 'mac64', 'win32', 'win64', depending on your system. Then open the application called 'Zombie Zap.exe' to play the game.
